text: Konstantin Pavlovich Khokhlov (, 1 November 1885 - 1 January 1956) was a Russian actor. == Selected filmography == * 1918 — Be silent, sorrow... be silent * 1927 — The Club of the Big Deed * 1933 — The Great Consoler ==References== == External links == * Константин Хохлов on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Russian male film actors Category:20th-century Russian male actors
title: Konstantin Khokhlov
